What have you added or changed? (e.g., "Added new Drone Hack icon")

## Checklist (Please check before submitting!)
- [ ] **Format:** The file is in `SVG` format (optional extras: PNG/AI/EPS allowed).
- [ ] **Filename:** The filename uses `snake_case` (e.g., `icon_drone.svg`) as requested in CONTRIBUTING.md.
- [ ] **Quality:** The vectors are clean (no unnecessary groups or hidden layers).
